description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - POSM and selling kits (catalogue/leaflet/poster/standee and display material) production, payment, stock management and delivery to the sales team
              
              - Construction pano, display corner and shopfront support: payment and licence management
              
              - Budget tracking and monthly report
              
              - Other assignments from supervisor
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University/College graduate (Marketing, Business Administration, Economics)
              
              - Meticulous, proactive, hard-working and willing-to-learn
              
              - Skills: project management, timeline management, paper working, negotiate, supplier management
              
              - Proficiency in office computer (Powerpoint, Word, Excel...)
              
              - The middle-up level in English
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th payment
               







                up to 24 leaves
               







                Company tour, Year End Party, Birthday Party
